name: Maze Racing
summary:
In Maze Racing you are facing challenging mazes with racing cars.
Get your cars to the finish and overcome obstacles like barriers, bridges and remote-controlled cars along the way.
Send two cars to the workshop to combine them or change their color in the paint shop to find the right solution.
Avoid collisions with other cars. Collect items on the race track to unlock new chapters.
100 diverse levels require thought, dexterity and a good sense of timing.
